SCENCE.NAME: INIT_CHIP
SCENCE.VALUE:
{ # slot 0 # 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0xc8, 0x02, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00005555, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000aaaa, 0x00, 0x00,
#Modified 0x00002400 from 0x0000003b to 0x00000039, due to the diffrerence registers between CS35L36 and CS35L36A# 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000039, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c08, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00e02800, 0xffffffff, 0x00dd0102, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c08, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00,
# delay 200 ms # 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0xc8, 0x02,
#Modified 0x00002400 from 0x0000003a to 0x00000038, due to the diffrerence registers between CS35L36 and CS35L36A# 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000038, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00,
# Turn off test page # 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000cccc, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00003333, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set clocking # # PLL ref clk = SCLK at 6.144MHz = 48KHz * 128 # # Configure and enable PLL # 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000d00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000510, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set audio routing for both amplifiers # # ASP TX1 = IMON # 0x00004c20, 0xffffffff, 0x00000019, 0x00, 0x00, # ASP TX2 = VMON # 0x00004c24, 0xffffffff, 0x00000018, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set audio format # # TDM1 Slave mode # 0x00004808, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, # RX Slot width = 64 and Data width = 24 bit # # TX Slot and Data width = 16 bit # 0x00004818, 0xffffffff, 0x00400010, 0x00, 0x00,
# TX in Hi-Z mode when not outputting # 0x00004800, 0xffffffff, 0x00200024, 0x00, 0x00,
# Enable blocks: AMP, BST, VBSTMON, TEMPMON, VMON, IMON # 0x00002018, 0xffffffff, 0x00003621, 0x00, 0x00,
#Left AMP INT MASK# 0x00d00040, 0xffffffff, 0xf9f8ffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d00044, 0xffffffff, 0xffffffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d00048, 0xefffffff, 0xefffffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d0004c, 0xffffffff, 0xffffffff, 0x00, 0x00,
#Set BST_OVP_THLD=11V# 0x00003830, 0xffffffff, 0x00000110, 0x00, 0x00,
# slot 1 # 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0xc8, 0x03, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00005555, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000aaaa, 0x00, 0x00,
#Modified 0x00002400 from 0x0000003b to 0x00000039, due to the diffrerence registers between CS35L36 and CS35L36A# 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000039, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c08, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00e02800, 0xffffffff, 0x00dd0102, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c08, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00,
# delay 200 ms # 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0x00000000, 0xc8, 0x02,
#Modified 0x00002400 from 0x0000003a to 0x00000038, due to the diffrerence registers between CS35L36 and CS35L36A# 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000038, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000c00, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00,
# Turn off test page # 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000cccc, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00003333, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set clocking # # PLL ref clk = SCLK at 6.144MHz = 48KHz * 128 # # Configure and enable PLL # 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000d00, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000510, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set audio routing for both amplifiers # # ASP TX1 = IMON # 0x00004c20, 0xffffffff, 0x00000019, 0x00, 0x00, # ASP TX2 = VMON # 0x00004c24, 0xffffffff, 0x00000018, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set audio format # # TDM1 Slave mode # 0x00004808, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, # RX Slot width = 64 and Data width = 24 bit # # TX Slot and Data width = 16 bit # 0x00004818, 0xffffffff, 0x00400010, 0x00, 0x00,
# TX in Hi-Z mode when not outputting # 0x00004800, 0xffffffff, 0x00200024, 0x00, 0x00,
# Enable blocks: AMP, BST, VBSTMON, TEMPMON, VMON, IMON # 0x00002018, 0xffffffff, 0x00003621, 0x00, 0x00, #Right AMP INT MASK# 0x00d00040, 0xffffffff, 0xf9f8ffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d00044, 0xffffffff, 0xffffffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d00048, 0xefffffff, 0xefffffff, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00d0004c, 0xffffffff, 0xffffffff, 0x00, 0x00,
#Set BST_OVP_THLD=11V# 0x00003830, 0xffffffff, 0x00000110, 0x00, 0x00}

SCENCE.NAME: VOICE_HANDFREE_POWER_ON_L
SCENCE.VALUE:
{ 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000c20, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00002c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000430, 0x00, 0x00,
#turn on ClassH# 0x0000201c, 0xffffffff, 0x01000010, 0x00, 0x00,
0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00005555, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000aaaa, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007064, 0xffffffff, 0x0929a800, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007850, 0xffffffff, 0x00002fa9, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007854, 0xffffffff, 0x0003f1d5, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007858, 0xffffffff, 0x0003f5e3, 0x00, 0x00, 0x0000785c, 0xffffffff, 0x00001137, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007860, 0xffffffff, 0x0001a7a5, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007864, 0xffffffff, 0x0002f16a, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007868, 0xffffffff, 0x00003e21, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007848, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000cccc, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00003333, 0x00, 0x00,
#Set Vboost Min level to 4.3V# 0x00006800, 0xffffffff, 0x002B0405, 0x00, 0x00, #set LDM_SEL = 111111# 0x00006808, 0xffffffff, 0x00003f33, 0x00, 0x00,
#Gain set to 17dB# 0x00006c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000233, 0x00, 0x00,
# Apply 3 errata writes # 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00005555, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000aaaa, 0x00, 0x00, 0x0000394c, 0xffffffff, 0x028764b7, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00002d10, 0xffffffff, 0x00018010, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00007418, 0xffffffff, 0x909001c8, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x0000cccc, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00000020, 0xffffffff, 0x00003333, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set max VBST and max Class H limit to 10V # 0x00003800, 0xffffffff, 0x00000097, 0x00, 0x00,
# Set Booster output follow ClassH # 0x00003804, 0xffffffff, 0x00000005, 0x00, 0x00,
# Left and right amp use diff slots # # TX1 = Slot 0, TX2 = Slot 1 # 0x0000481c, 0xffffffff, 0x00010000, 0x00, 0x00,
# RX1 = Slot 0 (Left Ch) # 0x0000482c, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, # Enable TX1 - TX2 and RX1 # 0x0000483c, 0xffffffff, 0x00010003, 0x00, 0x00,
0x00002014, 0xffffffff, 0x00000001, 0x00, 0x00, # INT_OUT_EN = 1 # 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000039, 0x00, 0x00}

SCENCE.NAME: MMI_POWER_OFF

{ # slot 0 # # INT_OUT_EN = 0 # 0x00002400, 0xffffffff, 0x00000038, 0x00, 0x00, #Turn on ClassH mode# 0x0000201c, 0xffffffff, 0x01000010, 0x00, 0x00,
#Set Booster output follow ClassH# 0x00003804, 0xffffffff, 0x00000005, 0x00, 0x00, 0x00002014, 0xffffffff, 0x00000000, 0x00, 0x00, #Set to default gain 17dB# 0x00006c04, 0xffffffff, 0x00000233, 0x00, 0x00,
